title: Rova of Antananarivo
description: Historic royal palace complex offering panoramic views of the city.

title: Analakely Market
description: Vibrant open-air market famous for traditional crafts and local produce.

title: Lake Anosy
description: Heart-shaped lake with iconic war memorial at its center.

title: Tsarasaotra Park
description: Urban wetland sanctuary with diverse bird species.

title: Ambohijatovo Park
description: Central city park with colonial-era architecture.

title: Iavoloha Palace
description: Modern presidential palace in southern suburbs.

title: Zoological Park
description: Botanical and zoological garden showcasing biodiversity.
